file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 31-31-01-06 - FLIGHT DATA RECORDER - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FLIGHT DATA RECORDER - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to make sure that the permitted life of the underwater-locator- beacon (ULB) battery installed on the flight data recorder (FDR) is not expired. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FDR ULB BATTERY - GENERAL VISUAL ALL 31-31-01-200-801-A INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 31-31-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 31-31-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FDR ULB BATTERY - GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to examine the FDR ULB-battery expiration date. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 31-31-02-000-801-A/400 FDR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - REMOVAL FDR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - INSTAL- AMM TASK 31-31-02-400-801-A/400 LATION Honeywell CMM 31-30-40 - L3 CMM 31-30-03 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage rear section Ι - Right side D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY To get access to the rear electronic compart- GSE 036 Platform - Hydraulic, Aircraft ment E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put up the hydraulic platform (GSE 036) at the necessary height. (2) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 31-31-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Verify the ULB-Battery Expiration Date SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) For aircraft equipped with Honeywell FDR refer to Figure 601. (2) For aircraft equipped with L3 FDR refer to Figure 602. (3) On the beacon case, see the date printed to show the battery permitted life. (4) (Aircraft with Honeywell FDR) If the date is expired, remove the FDR underwater locator beacon ( AMM TASK 31-31-02-000-801-A/400) and send it back to the manufacturer for servicing (Refer to the last revision of Honeywell CMM 31-30-40). (5) (Aircraft with L3 FDR) If the date is expired, remove the FDR underwater locator beacon ( AMM TASK 31-31-02-000-801-A/400) and send it back to the manufacturer for servicing (Refer to the last revision of L3 CMM 31-30-03). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install a new FDR underwater locator beacon ( AMM TASK 31-31-02-400-801-A/400). (2) Close access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (3) Remove the hydraulic platform (GSE 036). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 31-31-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
